node.contents: I'm trying to figure out why I'm getting the following exception when a client app is connecting to JBoss. I happens on startup, when the client attempts to connect to the server.

astNode.text: I'm trying to figure out why I'm getting the following exception when a client app is connecting to JBoss. I happens on startup, when the client attempts to connect to the server.

node.contents: Turns out I had a 'eelib.jar' which got added to my classpath. Removing this jar fixed the issue.

astNode.text: Turns out I had a 'eelib.jar' which got added to my classpath. Removing this jar fixed the issue.

node.contents: Is it possible that you've got a version mismatch? It appears that the EJBHome class you're loading does not have an expected method. Have you got a consistent set of JARs on your client classpath?

astNode.text: Is it possible that you've got a version mismatch? It appears that the EJBHome class you're loading does not have an expected method. Have you got a consistent set of JARs on your client classpath?
